description: Thanks Katia for being extremely Collaborative with me and Territory Implementation. You have always been quick in understanding the requirement and provide us with speedy and brilliant solutions. I would like to shout out for your superb collaboration with us and looking forward to a more wonderful journey with you and IS going ahead.

Benny has been exceptional in transforming his ideas into real world implementations. His contribution towards creation of the Template extension has got some really good feedbacks and has been greatly appreciated. Not limited to this, he has been showing full zeal in contributing towards other initiatives as well. Would like to appreciate Benny towards his quality of empowering the Team with the much need tools to focus on efficiency and quality.

I would like to appreciate the way Roshan properly documents all the cases that are escalated to Custom Team, with all the steps and checks that the custom team follows. It has greatly helped us in decreasing the escalations to custom. Thanks for imparting and enhancing our knowledge.
Just want to give a shout out to Benny , Vivek and Arun for being always so collaborative and making this work from home fun .

Since the day Rohit got promoted, I can see him working very aggressively towards achieving his goals and always striving to be better at what he is doing. I want to appreciate Rohit for his positive attitude towards learning new things.

Roshan is very versatile with his deliverables. His discipline and commitment towards his work is unquestionable. 
He is a great team player and has a very positive mindset. He always ensures his deliveries within the given timelines and with complete dedication. 
I want to appreciate Roshan for being such a crucial team player and being able to exhibit these qualities consistently.
Guarav is the wild card of our team. He prefers to be quiet and deliver extra ordinary stuffs. His capability to deliver under pressure situations and short deadlines makes him special.

Since the day Chirag has joined Spirit Committee, he has been a great support pillar to the team. His commitment and efforts are worth appreciating. I want to thank him for always being on top for any kind of help and proving the real meaning of being a Team Player.

Hi,

I want to appreciate your efforts for being an expert.

This is test shoutout.

Collaborative thinking is probably one of the most important competency one has to have and it is even more important that leaders are able to develop the similar mindset in their team members. I vividly remember my visit to London office last year and the challenges people in different business teams was facing while working the TI team. We have walked a long way together solving each of those challenges and taking our relationship to new heights every day. It was possible because of Arthur and his team's positive outlook for TI and Working with Arthur and his team is always a pleasure. Thank you Arthur!
Amazing
Thank you for being out Batman <3

message: Improving quality (anything from processes to life at Taboola)
description: Eloise, thanks so much for your hard work on this peer-to-peer recognition and gratitude program - I am very excited about this Taboola Inspire project now live!

Poonam has improved greatly in terms of handling customers and being an expert in the Taboola News front. She has also shown great initiation with the India Spirit Committee. Unfortunately, the form only allows me to select one quality. She has great potential, and her hard-work and professionalism is worth mentioning.
Patient / Resilient / Positive

Simon, thank you so much for the tremendous work you've been doing for the UK Pub Enterprise this year. Your ability to step into calls and offer your technical support and knowledge, the speed by which you execute and the quality of your work are inspirational to the team and everyone knows they can trust you blindly when you deliver a task.

It's a pleasure working alongside you, so just wanted to say Thank You for dealing with all our obscene and urgent requests in such a manner and contributing to our revenues and relationship with our partners.

Maayan is really good in Collaboration, bringing new ideas/innovations to the projects. She is very supportive & a very good listener. She is always available.
Thank You Maayan & Lee :)

Thanks for your continued support in reviewing campaigns at super-speed and therefore supporting us as AMs! You are always available, always give helpful advice to pass back to our clients and always promptly react to our 10000 gchats and cases! THANK YOU!

Thanks for your continued support in reviewing campaigns at super-speed and therefore supporting us as AMs! You are always available, always give helpful advice to pass back to our clients and always promptly react to our 10000 gchats and cases! THANK YOU!

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description: It is a pleasure to come to work every day with people like you in the team ! :)
He is very humble and provides detailed information about the product from start. Good guidance is all that a rookie needs and he does the job efficiently.

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: Thank you so much for helping me throughout, thanks for always assigning me different types of cases and helping me with that. It helped me a lot in terms of understanding the product. I truly appreciate your way of handling cases, they are always done smartly and in an optimized way. I am still trying to learn that skill form you :)
Has immense knowledge of product and very supportive. Thanks for being there when I was confused. He is the best buddy I had as along as I have worked with this organisation.

Hi Newsroom Nigel,
Thank you so much for your great support in organising the first virtual Oktoberfest! I truly enjoyed collaborating with you. I believe the 2 events we have organized in the last months have been the best Taboola events during lockdown. :-)
Thanks for your hard work, great ideas and editorial skills! 
Cheers!
Janina

Thank you so much for your creative solutions and for helping me will all the great tips and tricks which can be used while solving a case and enhancing the product knowledge. I truly appreciate all your help and support :)

Thank you so much for your creative solutions and for helping me will all the great tips and tricks which can be used while solving a case and enhancing the product knowledge. I truly appreciate all your help and support :)

message: Improving quality (anything from processes to life at Taboola)
description:
Thanks for providing the fundamental training. I truly appreciate the way you provided the virtual training they all were very interactive.
Also, thanks a lot for sharing the history behind creating any process, it helped me in understanding my responsibilities more clearly.

Thank you so much :)

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description:
First of all I would like to thank her for making me what I am in this organisation. She has laid foundation of my knowledge for the process. She has always been there for me be it in shift or off shift. I would also like to thank for her humbleness, while I was very new to the organisation I know I used to ask very silly things but she was always there to explain me same thing over and over. 

Thanks for being there.

Being a Shift Lead I know itâ€™s much more than what we do ,still you helped me in whatever and whenever way its possible. I really grateful to have you as a senior member in the team. Thanks for motivating me to pick much difficult cases to built up my confidence.

Thanks for always being there for your juniors.

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description:
When I started my training, it seemed like everything is so complicated for me because this process is new for me but the way you clearing  my doubts  regarding any case & any topic ,It helped me a lot to understand everything .I truly appreciate all your help and support :)
Thank you so much

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description: Thanks for your efforts to keep us all connected in a fun way during wfh times. We really appreciate the content and efforts

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description:
Thank you very much for being a great buddy, Mathilde!

You're always taking time to jump on a call when I have questions or need help and even invited me into your home to make me feel part of the team! Thank you!

I really appreciate your help and look forward to working with you back in the office! :)

Thank you for being a great Manager, Maxime!

I really appreciate that you're making time available in your calendar every day to make sure we can catch-up and talk about any questions that came up during the day. Also thank you for giving me suggestions on how to sell Taboola, how to optimise and make the most out of my accounts & even jumping on calls with German clients to support me.

When I had the interview, one of the most important points for me was having a good training but I really wasn't expecting this kind of support, especially during this time! So thank you for going above and beyond!

Thanks for your advice and the sales sessions we had! 
It really helped me figuring out how to approach and communicate with publishers in the most effective way by being personal and "helping" instead of "selling".

Thank you for being a great colleague and your help so far!

It's good to know that I can ensure my future publishers that they will have a very friendly & professional Account Manager with great product knowledge. I guess it's now on me to deliver :)

Thank you, Kateryna!

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description:
Hi Guys!

I wanted to take the time to thank all of you for being great team members,  for your willingness to help and for making the last few months and the whole onboarding a lot easier and less weird for me!

I really appreciate that everyone is regularly checking in and asking if there is anything they can do for me. There is not one single person in the team who hasn't offered me their help yet which is really remarkable - especially as I know how busy you all are!

I hope I can meet all of you soon and look forward to working with you in person when we can finally go back into the office :)

Thank you!

Cedric

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: Vivek is always ready to help everyone in the Team. Always available and is very approachable. Thank you for being so supportive!
Thanks Vivek for always been available and to never say no for anything . You are a rock-star (keep rocking)

message: Going above and beyond to support colleagues
description: He is always ready to help and support teammates.

message: Contributing to the maintenance and definition of Taboola's culture
description: Legends who work hard with great team spirit!!
